import React, { Component } from 'react' import Navigation from '../components/Navigation' import "../scss/AboutMe.scss" import { faFacebookF, faInstagram, faGithub } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import IFZ from "../image/meInIFZ2.jpg"; export class AboutMe extends Component { render() { return (

Hello,
I'm Ayman,
Web Develober Based in Leipzig, Germany.
Front-End Developer | React.js | HTML, CSS.

I'm Ayman, Web Develober based in Germany.
I'm from Syria, was born in Qatar and live in Leipzig since five years.
I'm interested in Music, History, Decoration and Cooking.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me at a Techno Party.

) } } export default AboutMe
